content: Once he's defeated, you can lure down the first of several Puppet Spiders just past the stairs, but be sure to also turn around to find a small path up to an alcove with a green Wisp, and a ledge that will drop you back into the hanging cocoon passage.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Webbed_Hollow-Upper_Hollow_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Webbed Hollow - Upper Hollow Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Pool of Shattered Jade'.
The content is as follows:
Once he's defeated, you can lure down the first of several Puppet Spiders just past the stairs, but be sure to also turn around to find a small path up to an alcove with a green Wisp, and a ledge that will drop you back into the hanging cocoon passage.
